meanings: [명사] admiration, wonder, awe, [동사] admire, wonder (at), marvel (at)

examples.korean: They admired the rugged beauty of the coastline. 발음듣기 그들은 들쭉날쭉한 그 해안선의 아름다움에 감탄했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They admired the rugged beauty of the coastline. 발음

examples.korean: He admired her willingness to buck the system. 발음듣기 그는 기꺼이 체제에 맞서려는 그녀의 태도에 감탄했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He admired her willingness to buck the system. 발음

examples.korean: Everyone admired her patience and unfailing good humour. 발음듣기 모두가 그녀의 인내심과 변함없는 쾌활함에 감탄했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Everyone admired her patience and unfailing good humour. 발음

examples.korean: a look of undisguised admiration 발음듣기 숨김없는 감탄을 드러낸 표정 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a look of undisguised admiration 발음

examples.korean: I admire his thoroughness. 발음듣기 나는 그의 철저함이 감탄스럽다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
